title: Game crashed and can't rejoin
body: It keeps dc me and I can't even access the store or anything else

replies.body:
*Very descriptive.*

Are you able to log in fine? What error message appear when you try to go into a game? Do you get into a game and *then* it crashes?
The issue has been resolved I'm still not sure what caused it
Did you *do* something to resolve it? Or did it just fix itself?
I really don't want to disappoint my team and get banned
